channel.title: Ham on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Ham on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Honey Baked Ham Recipe For 200
item.description: Delicious honey baked ham for 200 with a quick 15 minute prep time and 1 hour cook time is easy for large group meals. Honey baked ham recipe has honey, clove, brown sugar, and applesauce, very delicious! Honey Baked Ham for 200 Recipe Ingredients 45 lbs. of buffet ham pre-sliced to 1/4" 5 tsp ground clove 4 c honey 10 c applesauce 8 c brown sugar Directions In shallow hotel pans, shingle ham.

item.title: Scalloped Potatoes – Grandma’s Comfort Food
item.description: Quick Scalloped Potatoes is Grandma’s recipe and will satisfy any appetite. Add ham to this Scalloped Potato recipe for a wonderful comfort food a cold winter day. Scalloped Potatoes Ingredients Scalloped Potatoes 6 potatoes, peeled, thin sliced 1/2 onion, diced 2 rib celery, diced 4 oz. butter, melted 1 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 2 cups flour 3 cups milk Scalloped Potatoes Directions In large casserole dish, place a layer of potatoes in bottom.
